spared.visualize.get_exp_frac

spared.visualize.get_exp_frac(adata: AnnData) → AnnData[source]

Get expression fraction for each gene

This function computes the expression fraction for each gene in the dataset. Internally it gets the expression fraction for each slide and then takes the minimum across all the slides.
